1406430.name: Fantasy Grounds - Here Be Kobolds Special!
1406430.description:
Here Be Kobolds Special!

A pack with Space and Undead themed Kobolds!

This product includes:
  • Kobold_Ghost
  • Kobold_Ghost_Paragon
  • Kobold_Skeleton
  • Kobold_Skeleton_Paragon_Black
  • Kobold_Skeleton_Paragon_Blue
  • Kobold_Skeleton_Paragon_Green
  • Kobold_Skeleton_Paragon_Red
  • Kobold_Skeleton_Paragon_White
  • Kobold_Space_Bouncer_Black
  • Kobold_Space_Bouncer_Blue
  • Kobold_Space_Bouncer_Green
  • Kobold_Space_Bouncer_Red
  • Kobold_Space_Bouncer_White
  • Kobold_Space_Miner_Black
  • Kobold_Space_Miner_Blue
  • Kobold_Space_Miner_Green
  • Kobold_Space_Miner_Red
  • Kobold_Space_Miner_White
  • Kobold_Space_Paragon_Black
  • Kobold_Space_Paragon_Blue
  • Kobold_Space_Paragon_Green
  • Kobold_Space_Paragon_Red
  • Kobold_Space_Paragon_white
  • Kobold_Zombie_Black
  • Kobold_Zombie_Blue
  • Kobold_Zombie_Green
  • Kobold_Zombie_Paragon_Azul
  • Kobold_Zombie_Paragon_Black
  • Kobold_Zombie_Paragon_Green
  • Kobold_Zombie_Paragon_Red
  • Kobold_Zombie_Paragon_White
  • Kobold_Zombie_Red
  • Kobold_Zombie_white
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
